import React from 'react' const Spammail = () => { const [formStatus, setFormStatus] = React.useState('Send') const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setFormStatus('Submitting...') const { name, email, message } = e.target.elements let conFom = { name: name.value, email: email.value, message: message.value, } console.log(conFom) } return (
